segments.text: So , Monica , what do you feel like doing this afternoon ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually , I had a perfect plan for this afternoon , but it is totally ruined by the sand storm . I woke up this morning and found it was sunny . So I called Lucy and asked her to go shopping with me . We were going to look for a new purse . Now it turned out to be like this . Neither of us wants to go to outside anymore .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s too bad . I hate sand storms too . It can be worse than any kind of bad weather .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What ’ s wrong with climate ? Anyway , I think the sand storm happens more frequently these days than the years before . Can ’ t people do something to stop it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is not an easy job . The government is working on it . Lots of trees have been planted in the north of the capital . Also , methods of generating rain are being used by the government to fight against the drought . But of course , it will not work overnight . So , have you come out with a new plan for today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My new plan is to wait for the end of the sand storm and clean my apartment .
segments.speaker: S2
